Resort.name: Marriott's Mai Khao Beach — Phuket
Resort.intro:
Experience Thai treasures and delights

Set in a tropical paradise - Marriott's Mai Khao Beach introduces you to a realm of indescribable beauty, renowned Thai hospitality and unexpected touches. Allow the lush surroundings of this enchanted island paradise to soothe you into pure relaxation.
Resort.description: Located in the pristine Mai Khao Beach area, this oasis of natural beauty boasts views of the Andaman Sea, golden-sand beaches and exotic forests.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Well-appointed 2- bedroom, 2- bath villas accommodate up to 6 guests
  • Variety of dining options and spa treatments at the nearby JW Marriott® Phuket Resort & Spa
  • Swimming pool and children's outdoor pool with waterslide
  • Located near championship golf courses and amazing beaches

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Marriott's Mai Khao Beach is the perfect destination to enjoy unforgettable vacations amid unspoiled beauty.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Discover incredible adventures, from trekking through jungles on elephants to nature cruises via sea canoes. Exotic shopping, spectacular golf and delicious dining also abound.

MapAndTransportation.drivingDirectionIntroText: From Regional Airports to local businesses to historic attractions, our interactive map will help you get there with ease.

Resort.name: Marriott Vacation Club® at Surfers Paradise
Resort.intro:
Discover a luxurious holiday Down Under

Relish in unexpected moments of discovery at Marriott Vacation Club® at Surfers Paradise. This luxurious resort is the perfect starting point to experience the wonders of Australia’s scenic Gold Coast.
Resort.description: This luxury resort offers guestrooms and suites – plus access to impeccable amenities at Surfers Paradise Marriott Resort & Spa, including sparkling white sandy beaches and unique aquatic experiences. From this resort, you can visit popular attractions and theme parks or explore endless options for shopping and entertainment along the Gold Coast.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Elegantly appointed guestrooms and suites
  • Spectacular saltwater lagoon filled with an array of tropical fish
  • Variety of on-site dining locations that serve international and Japanese cuisine
  • Ruby Spa, fitness center, outdoor pool and whirlpool


Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Marriott Vacation Club<sup>®</sup> at Surfers Paradise provides an elegant retreat on Australia’s Gold Coast. During your stay, take advantage of the resort’s varied amenities to enhance your holiday.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Australia's Gold Coast offers an abundance of natural scenic beauty and outdoor activities amid sun, sand and surf. Vacationers can also explore family friendly attractions, city adventures and wildlife sanctuaries — and Marriott Vacation Club at Surfers Paradise is the perfect starting point to experience it all.

Resort.name: Marriott's Crystal Shores
Resort.intro:
A Dazzling Tropical Oasis

At the southern tip of Florida's famed west coast, Marriott's Crystal Shores at Marco Island is the perfect place to stay and play by the Gulf of Mexico.
Resort.description: Located on the southern tip of Florida's Gulf Coast, this resort provides easy access to 3 miles of pristine beach. Nearby spa treatments and championship golf enhance your experience.
Resort.importantNotice:
Please note construction is currently underway daily in front of the Poolside villas between the hours of 8:00 a.m.- 6:00 p.m. to complete the Upper Cascade pool/ pool deck and additional plaza level amenities. Please contact the resort at (239) 393-6800 if you have any questions.

Refurbishment activity will be occurring daily from early-September, 2018 to mid-December, 2018 between the hours of 8:00 a.m.- 6:00 p.m. Guests may expect light construction noise and the presence of contractors during their stay.

Construction activity is occurring adjacent to the resort with an estimated completion date of late-2017. Construction will be largely located on the adjacent parcel of land between South Collier Avenue and the existing resort, and will predominately take place during the hours of 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. daily. During construction, guests may expect pedestrian, vehicular and parking detours. Although adjacent construction activity and noise will occur, the existing amenities and facilities of Marriott’s Crystal Shores will be fully-operational. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious, elegantly appointed 2-bedroom/2-bath villas and 3-bedroom/3-bath villas
  • Floor-to-ceiling windows and balconies with stunning resort or island views
  • Desirable Gulf of Mexico beachfront location with easy access to nearby Naples, Florida
  • 2 swimming pools with interactive features overlooking the water
  • Access to excellent golf courses, spas, restaurants, nightlife nearby
  • On-site MarketPlacesm Express convenience store, fitness center and extensive children's activities programs.

Features and amenities are proposed and subject to change.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureDisclaimer: Marriott International, Inc., Marriott Vacation Club International and their respective affiliates and subsidiaries, make no warranty, express or implied, as to the condition, capacity, performance or any other aspect of the activities, events, or service providers listed herein. No inquiry has been made into the activities or events, or the qualifications or the quality of services offered by the providers. Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary:
Along a breathtaking stretch of beach along the Gulf of Mexico, our sparkling resort welcomes you with gracious service and stylish features - from a posh poolside bar to multiple swimming pools to attentive concierge service and stunning penthouse villas.

Redeem Vacation Club Points for resort credit for on-site experiences and more at this property. View list of options.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Florida's famed west coast provides endless exciting excursions- from beach days to amazing golf and spa experiences, touring Marco Island by trolley or even adventuring into the Everglades National Park by airboat.

Resort.name: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse℠ at Custom House, Boston
Resort.intro:
The Best of Boston

Steps from Boston Harbor, Marriott Vacation Club Pulse at Custom House, Boston finds you in the heart of historic Boston. This retreat's impeccable style and unbeatable location makes it the perfect place to relive American history on vacations you won't soon forget.
Resort.description:
Located within the historic Boston Custom House, this elegant urban retreat provides gracious views of Boston Harbor as well as convenient access to the city's historic Freedom Trail.
Learn more about Marriott Vacation Club Pulse.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious, elegantly appointed 1-bedroom suites accommodate up to 4 guests
  • Located in the heart of historic Boston, steps away from the harbor and Faneuil
    • Hall The Marketplace
  • A rare opportunity to stay in one of Boston's most recognizable landmarks
  • Surrounded by historic attractions, cultural arts venues, famous shopping, dining, more

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureDisclaimer: PL-16-023
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureTitle: Central to the best of historic Boston.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: From its elegant accommodations to gracious services, this retreat provides the ideal place to base your Boston vacations. Experience the rich history and all the modern-day delights of this city staying in this lovingly preserved Boston landmark.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Tour the myriad historical sites of Boston on foot, by trolley or Duck Boat, an amphibious land/water rover. Enjoy world-famous dining, shopping and performing arts. Cruise to Boston Islands State Park, go whale watching and much, much more.

  • Splendid 1-bedroom/2-bath and 2-bedroom/3-bath suites accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Oceanfront suites on Kaanapali Beach, all with garden/mountain or ocean views
  • Excellent golf at the Kaanapali Golf Courses North and South and other nearby courses
  • Meandering outdoor pools with waterfall, walking bridges, pool bar

Resort.name: Marriott's Summit Watch
Resort.intro:
Park City at Its Peak

In the heart of bustling Park City, amid scores of eclectic shops, dining and nightlife spots, Marriott's Summit Watch is the perfect place to enjoy the best of it all. Make your alpine getaway to this unique resort for fabulous times, every time.
Resort.description: This cozy retreat surrounded by the Wasatch Mountains is just steps from charming shops, restaurants and the Town Ski Lift. About a mile away is a mountain biking trail and golf course.
Resort.importantNotice:
Please note that various construction projects will be completed at Summit Watch during the months of April, 2017 through June, 2017. During this time, the pool and hot tubs will be closed, access to buildings and restaurants will be restricted, and construction noise will occur. Please contact the resort at 435-647-4100 for specifics and additional inquiries. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.


On-site parking is limited to one vehicle per reservation, no oversized vehicles permitted (7'4" max height). Off-site parking is offered nearby, subject to availability, for a fee. For details on off-site parking, you may call 435-647-4100.


Please click here to view information on our maintenance schedule.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious, elegantly appointed 2-bedroom, 2-bath villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Located in the town of Park City, surrounded by world-famous ski areas, shops, dining and other attractions
  • Four-seasons recreation includes world-class golf, spas, watersports, hiking, fishing, more
  • Large indoor pool and Aquacade with heated indoor/outdoor connecting pool, whirlpool spas
  • On-site restaurants, The Marketplace Expresssm convenience store, fitness center

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: This resort balances an exciting in-town location with beautiful accommodations and many on-site amenities that assure you always have a wonderful and relaxing stay here. There's simply no better or more comfortable place to stay and play in Park City.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: While magnificent skiing tops the list of attractions here, there's lots of other great things to see and do here - from sensational golf courses to fly-fishing to river rafting, quaint Park City shopping, thumping nightlife and nature excursions galore.

Resort.name: Marriott's Manor Club
Resort.resortDisplayName: Marriott's Manor Club at Ford's Colony
Resort.intro:
Historical Hideaway

Surrounded by Virginia woodlands, Marriott's Manor Club, a Marriott Vacation Club resort, offers a majestic, exclusive retreat. Enjoy the charm and grace of an era gone by every day you vacation here.
Resort.description: This resort is nestled within Ford’s Colony Williamsburg, an exclusive 3,000-acre planned community. Nearby are historic treasures and landmarks, including Jamestown Settlement.
Resort.importantNotice: Please note the Marsh Hawk golf course at Ford's Colony Country Club is closed for renovation starting June 1, 2017 with an estimated completion date of September 4, 2017. Booking tee times during this period will be affected; however, two other golf courses will be open. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and elegantly appointed studio,1- and 2-bedroom villas accommodate as many as 6 to 8 guests
  • Williamsburg has many historical and entertainment attractions
  • Williamsburg has many historical and entertainment attractions
  • Beautiful golf club
  • Secluded, country estate resort with beautiful grounds
  • The Marketplacesm convenience store, fitness center and planned children's/family activities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: With its picturesque setting, on-site recreations and gracious services, this resort is a wonderful vacation destination in its own right. You'll be quite comfortable and well taken care of when you make this your base for historic Williamsburg getaways.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Spots for great family fun abound here. Visit Busch Gardens Williamsburg or Water Country USA theme parks. Step back in time at Jamestown Settlement or nearby Yorktown. Enjoy great golf at Ford's Colony or day trips to many other amazing sites.

Resort.name: Marriott's MountainSide
Resort.intro:
Tops for Great Times

Right on the slopes of the spectacular Park City ski area, near all of the town's famous shopping, dining and arts, Marriott's MountainSide elevates alpine vacations to new heights. Base your trip here and you will never be let down.
Resort.description: Built into the Wasatch foothills, this charming resort is surrounded by rugged beauty. Discover unspoiled wilderness teeming with wildlife and a small town that hosts the Sundance Film Festival.
Resort.importantNotice:
Please note there will be construction efforts from the town of Park City at the end of the resort driveway beginning September 5, 2017 with an estimated completion date of October 10, 2017. During this time, guests can expect road closures, detours and intermittent noise from the hours of 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. daily. There will be alternate routes to access the garage. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

The Activity Center will be closed for renovations beginning October 23, 2017 with an estimated completion date of December 1, 2017. There will be activities scheduled daily in other areas of the property or off-site. Activity schedules will be available upon check-in and prior to arrival. Guests may expect construction noise/activity daily from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Parking in the MountainSide garage is extremely limited. Indoor parking is limited to one vehicle per reservation and is complimentary. Additional parking is available at an off-site, outdoor, lot for a nightly fee. If you will be arriving with an additional vehicle or an oversized vehicle, please call us in advance at 435-940-2042 to make arrangements prior to your arrival.

Please contact the resort at 435.940.2000 for any assistance. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

  • Ski-in/ski-out convenience to Park City slopes
  • Four-season recreation including world-class golf, spas, watersports, hiking, fishing, more
  • Large, heated central courtyard pool with whirlpool spa
  • On-site restaurants, The Marketplace Expresssm convenience store

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Enjoy incredible outdoor recreation from skiing Park City's renowned ski areas to river rafting or plunging down a 3,000-foot alpine slide. The golf is great here, too. And don't miss world-class shopping, dining and the Sundance Film Festival.

Resort.name: Marriott's Willow Ridge Lodge
Resort.intro:
Show-Stopping Good Times

In the heart of hopping Branson - with more theater seats than Broadway - Marriott's Willow Ridge Lodge dazzles with spacious accommodations and nonstop family friendly fun.
Resort.description: Located in the scenic Ozark Mountains, this rustic and charming resort is a tranquil place to relax after enjoying entertaining shows, fun-filled theme parks and abundant outdoor activities.
Resort.importantNotice: Please note the Canopy Cove indoor pool will be closed for refurbishment from July 19, 2017 through September 4, 2017. The outdoor pools and amenities are anticipated to remain open during this time. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and comfortably appointed 2-bedroom villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Conveniently located in the heart of Branson, where there are numerous theaters and other attractions
  • Charming resort complex with indoor and outdoor pools and scenic wooded surroundings
  • Branson features beautiful golf courses and picturesque lakes
  • On-site The Marketplace Expresssm convenience store and fitness center

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: This resort makes your Branson getaway all the more satisfying, comfortable and fun. With super comfortable accommodations, friendly services and so much to do right here, all this place leaves you longing for is a longer vacation.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: The stars come out every night at Branson's dozens of music stages and playhouses. Visit nearby White Water Park, sip libations at Stone Hill Winery, cruise Table Rock Lake on the Showboat Branson Belle or step back in time at Silver Dollar City.

Resort.name: Marriott's Kauai Beach Club
Resort.intro:
Tropical Oasis

Unspoiled and pristine, Kauai is an island wonderland of natural beauty. Known as the "garden isle", Kauai is home to shimmering lagoons, ivory beaches and lush rain forests.
Resort.description: This paradise is tucked within a scenic cove on Kalapaki Beach, rated one of Hawaii's best swimming beaches. Learn to surf, snorkel or just relax amid tropical beauty.
Resort.importantNotice:
Please note that our villas do not have full kitchens. Instead they offer a small gourmet center which includes a microwave, mini refrigerator, coffee maker, blender, toaster, dishwasher and utensils. A gourmet center is not included in the Guestroom (lock-off) accommodations and all Parlor accommodations are equipped with a Queen wall bed.

In addition, our villas do not have washers and dryers in the units, however, we do have laundry facilities on property for guest use.

Please be advised that the Kauai Beach Club will be renovating our villas from August 17, 2018 through February of 2019. Renovations will be completed floor by floor and take place daily between 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. during which there will be considerable construction-related noise. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause during your stay and thank you for your understanding.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious 1-bedroom/1-bath and 2-bedroom/2-bath villas with ocean and garden views
  • Spectacular beachfront resort with tropical landscaping and a spectacular 26,000-square-foot swimming pool
  • 18-holes of championship course designed by Jack Nicklaus
  • Restaurants, shopping, fitness center and children's/family activities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

No inquiry has been made into the activities or events, or the qualifications or the quality of services offered by the providers. Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary:
Located on one of the world's most enchanting islands, Marriott's Kauai Beach Club offers sumptuous accommodations, world-class services and an array of exhilarating experiences right outside your door. Sit back, relax and bask in the sunshine as you enjoy this island paradise retreat.

Redeem Vacation Club Points for resort credit for on-site experiences and more at this property. View list of options.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Explore the garden isle on foot, horseback, kayak or ATV to discover its stunning beauty and views. Cruise the Wailua River and experience Polynesian culture, or golf at some of the world's finest courses and sun on its most famed and filmed beaches.

Resort.name: Marriott Grand Residence Club<sup>&reg</sup>, Lake Tahoe
Resort.intro:
A Grand Destination

A Grand Destination for more than 100 years, Lake Tahoe has represented the ideal retreat for body and soul. While its rugged spirit and incredible beauty can satisfy anyone's desires, it is also a haven for those who seek adventure and excitement. In the heart of South Shore, at the base of Heavenly Mountain, native stone and rustic timbers are fashioned into Marriott Grand Residence Club, Lake Tahoe. A place where comfort reigns supreme and grandeur is softened with a friendly, casual style.
Resort.description: From downhill skiing, snowboarding and cross-country skiing to golfing, boating and hiking, this year-round resort is ideal for exploring Lake Tahoe's endless outdoor activities.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • From the compact comfort of a studio to the incredible spaciousness of multi-room suites, the resort offers an assortment of floorplans, ranging from 360 square feet to approximately 2,500 square feet.
  • Located at the base of Heavenly Mountain, adjacent to Heavenly Village, featuring shopping, dining, and entertainment.
  • State-of-the-art health club with sauna and fully-equipped fitness center. On-site spa.

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureDisclaimer: Marriott International, Inc., Marriott Vacation Club International and their respective affiliates and subsidiaries, make no warranty, express or implied, as to the condition, capacity, performance or any other aspect of the activities, events, or service providers listed herein. No inquiry has been made into the activities or events, or the qualifications or the quality of services offered by the providers. Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: At this resort, you are surrounded by ski trails and bike paths, casinos and entertainment, and world-renowned restaurants.

ExternalCodes.uvCode: QT = 13 week fractional product,QE = 5 week interest product,QC = 3 week interest product

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: So Much To Do. Grand Residence Club, Lake Tahoe is in the center of all the South Shore of Lake Tahoe has to offer. Summer, winter, spring, or fall, Lake Tahoe teems with activity. It is a place where you can catch a fish most days of the year, and the Sierra Nevada provides opportunities for hiking, biking, horseback riding, and rock climbing amongst other activities.

Resort.name: Marriott's Waikoloa Ocean Club*
Resort.intro:
Discover paradise inspired.

Whether you’re seeking adventure or looking for relaxation, Marriott’s Waikoloa Ocean Club, like the Big Island itself, will be a truly unique vacation destination.
Resort.description:
Inspired by white sand beaches, lush green flora and fiery red volcanoes on Hawaii, this welcoming oasis will celebrate the breathtaking landscapes of the Big Island.

*Marriott’s Waikoloa Ocean Club is now available for reservations as an exchange option through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations™ Exchange Program
Resort.importantNotice:
Renovations of the cabana building sidewalk and guest room interiors are taking place from August, 2017 through December 2017. Guests may expect construction related noise/views Monday-Sunday during the hours of 8:00 a.m. – 6:00 p.m. Resort amenities and services will not be impacted. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Please note suites include a washer/dryer, refrigerator-freezer, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, blender, dishwasher and various serving utensils. Barbecue grills are available on the lawn. Suites do not have a stove or oven. One bedroom suites include a walk-in shower with no bathtub. Two bedroom suites include a bathtub in the guest bathroom. For additional details please email mvckoamv.prearrival@vacationclub.com or contact the property at 808-883-8191.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • The one- and two-bedroom suites of Marriott Vacation Club's latest proposed Hawaiian resort will be co-located with the Waikoloa Beach Marriott Resort & Spa, and will celebrate the rich culture and diverse landscape.
  • This welcoming island resort will feature three swimming pools, two local championship golf courses, an ancient Hawaiian fish pond and petroglyphs as old as time — all adjacent to the white sands of Anaehoomalu Bay.
  • Beyond the resort you can explore jungle trails on foot or horseback, or trek along ancient lava tubes. Stroll black sand beaches and wander through colorful towns. Or set your sights even higher and tour active volcanoes of the snowcapped summit of Mauna Kea.

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

*Marriott’s Waikoloa Ocean Club is now available for reservations as an exchange option through the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations™ Exchange Program

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: During your stay at Marriott’s Waikoloa Ocean Club, you will be able to explore jungle trails on foot or horseback, trek ancient lava tubes, stroll black sand beaches and wander through colorful towns. Or you can set your sights even higher and tour active volcanoes or the snowcapped summit of Mauna Kea.

Resort.name: Marriott's Harbour Lake
Resort.intro:
Key West Flair in Orlando

With architecture evoking the leisurely elegance of Key West, Marriott's Harbour Lake infuses South Florida charm and a range of exciting amenities. Enjoy thrills by day and relaxation by night at this remarkable resort.
Resort.description: This resort boasts Key West charm, an interactive pirate-inspired pool and a romantic lakeside boardwalk. After each fun-filled day, its carefree atmosphere envelopes you in tranquility.
Resort.importantNotice: Please note our Florida Falls waterpark will be closed for refurbishment September 5, 2017 through September 22, 2017. All other resort pools and amenities will remain open during this time. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Studios, 1- and 2-bedroom villas for up to 8 guests
  • Fun family-oriented resort with pirate-themed feature pool
  • Key Lime Greens® 18-hole miniature golf course†  on-site and Florida Falls Pool Complex†, which includes Waterworks, an interactive water playground

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary:
Surrounded by the world's most famous theme parks, this resort offers an amazing array of family-fun water features, children's recreational programs and convenient on-site amenities.

Redeem Vacation Club Points for resort credit for on-site experiences and more at this property. View list of options.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: From Walt Disney World® Theme Parks to SeaWorld, Orlando is home to the world's biggest and best theme parks. Great golf, spas and water sports are also nearby. And don't miss the fun-filled festivals, from Mardi Gras at Universal Studios to Mickey's Very Merry Christmas.

Resort.name: Marriott's Oceana Palms
Resort.intro:
The Palm Beaches - Where Dreams Become Reality

Close your eyes, think warm thoughts and start to drift away. Let your mind take you to Florida's Atlantic Coast. There, Marriott's Oceana Palms' two magnificent 19-story towers will rise gracefully above the blue-green ocean to greet the morning sun and inspire the best of dreams.
Resort.description: Located on Florida's Gold Coast, this contemporary resort offers incomparable views of the Atlantic and convenient access to world-class golf, tennis and oceanfront activities.
Resort.importantNotice: Please note the property adjacent to our resort will have construction activities through late 2018. We will do our best to minimize impact to our guests; however, there may be occasional detours for parking and pedestrian/vehicular traffic. Construction related activities/noises may be observed over the course of this project. Please email MVWNextDoorConstruct@vacationclub.com for additional specific details. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • 2-bedroom/2-bath villas will be approximately 1,100 square feet and will accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Villa views will be oceanfront and oceanview with oversized balconies
  • Master suite will include an oversize shower with multiple showerheads
  • Villas will feature fully-equipped island kitchen with granite countertops, stainless-steel appliances including an oven, microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher
  • Living rooms will have a 40-inch flat-panel television and each bedroom will have a 32-inch flat-panel television with satellite programming and DVD player
  • Complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access
  • Villas will have a utility area with a washer and dryer

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Resort.name: Marriott's Sabal Palms
Resort.intro:
Sun, Fun and Serenity

Just minutes from all the excitement and action of the world's favorite fun parks, Marriott's Sabal Palms offers an oasis of comfort and calm.
Resort.description: Orlando's world-famous fun is conveniently within reach from this welcoming resort. Even closer are the amenities at the adjacent Orlando World Center Marriott<sup>®</sup> Resort & Convention Center.
Resort.importantNotice: Villa renovation efforts are scheduled to begin August 28, 2016 with an expected completion date of October 28, 2016. The project includes renovation efforts in six (6) of our buildings. Each will be closed, one at a time, to ensure the least amount of impact to our owners and guests. While we expect the impact to be minimal, there may be daily periods of intermittent noise in the area. Thank you for your understanding. Should you need additional information, please contact the resort at 407-238-6200.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious, elegantly appointed 2-bedroom/2-bath villas accommodate up to 6 guests
  • In the heart of Orlando, minutes away from all the major theme parks
  • Excellent golf at Hawk's Landing with nearby spas, dining and shopping options
  • Indoor/outdoor pools, whirlpool spas, a sparkling lake, lush palms
  • Restaurant, fitness center and recreational facilities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Resort.name: Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve
Resort.intro:
Only One

Perfect weather and perfect surroundings. And so many ways to enjoy both. Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve will have everything you could want in a vacation resort.
Resort.description: This sophisticated retreat amid world-famous attractions offers access to the amenities of the adjacent JW Marriott<sup>®</sup> Orlando Grande Lakes<sup>®</sup> and The Ritz-Carlton<sup>®</sup> Orlando, Grande Lakes.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Shares the 500-acre Grande Lakes Orlando campus with a JW Marriott and The Ritz-Carlton Orlando, Grande Lakes, offering top-notch golf, an award-winning spa and many onsite restaurants
  • Elegantly appointed 2- and 3-bedroom villas and townhomes for up to 12 guests
  • Future proposed amenities will include an elegant pool, a zero-entry pool including two dueling waterslides, 3 whirlpool spas and pool bar
  • Future proposed amenities will include The Marketplacesm convenience store, fitness center, planned children's activities, a waterside promenade, firepits and enhanced outdoor grilling facilities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureDisclaimer: Marriott International, Inc., Marriott Vacation Club International and their respective affiliates and subsidiaries, make no warranty, express or implied, as to the condition, capacity, performance or any other aspect of the activities, events, or service providers listed herein. No inquiry has been made into the activities or events, or the qualifications or the quality of services offered by the providers. Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary:
The experience at Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve will be designed with you in mind. Your vacation time is valuable, and we endeavor to make your vacation exactly what you want it to be. After a stay here, you will feel refreshed, re-energized and reconnected.

Redeem Vacation Club Points for resort credit for on-site experiences and more at this property. View list of options.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Grande Lakes Orlando offers an array of fine restaurants, superb golf, exciting eco tours and an indulgent spa. And for those who like to explore, the energetic city of Orlando has plenty to offer as well. From a dazzling array of world-renowned attractions to fabulous shopping, dining and nightlife experiences. Enjoy the energy and excitement of the city or retreat from action-packed days at Marriott's Lakeshore Reserve.

Resort.name: Marriott's Harbour Point
Resort.intro:
So Many High Points

Surrounded by picturesque Shelter Cove Harbour on Hilton Head Island, Marriott's Harbour Point provides an idyllic vacation hideaway. Enjoy all of the Island's sublime pleasures and exciting pastimes while relaxing at this serene family retreat.
Resort.description: Nestled in Shelter Cove Harbour overlooking Broad Creek, this centrally located and secluded resort is perfectly positioned for you to enjoy golf and all the recreational activities Hilton Head Island offers.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and elegantly appointed 2-bedroom/2-bath villas accommodate up to 6 guests
  • Non-smoking resort
  • Beautiful resort overlooking Shelter Cove Harbour, surrounded by lush grounds
  • Located near many world-class golf courses, restaurants and recreational areas
  • On-site fitness center and planned family and children's activities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureDisclaimer: Marriott International, Inc., Marriott Vacation Club International and their respective affiliates and subsidiaries, make no warranty, express or implied, as to the condition, capacity, performance or any other aspect of the activities, events, or service providers listed herein. No inquiry has been made into the activities or events, or the qualifications or the quality of services offered by the providers. Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: A peaceful, private setting, exceptional accommodations and many thoughtful amenities render this resort a wonderful place to stay and play on Hilton Head Island. Make this your vacation home for blissful relaxation and cherished memories year after year.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Hilton Head Island offers countless Low-Country excursions, sweeping sights and outdoor recreation. Ride a bike to the beach at Palmetto Dunes. Climb to the top of a lighthouse. Discover Pinckney Island National Wildlife Refuge. Stroll through Savannah. Or play dozens of challenging golf courses.

Resort.name: Marriott Vacation Club<sup>®</sup> at The Empire Place<sup>©</sup>
Resort.intro:
Explore Thailand’s past and present

Located within a high-end condominium residence in the heart of Bangkok – the capital city of Thailand – Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place is conveniently located near Sathorn Road and Taksin Bridge. It also offers spacious, elegantly appointed accommodations and warm Thai hospitality.
Resort.description: Located within a high-end condominium residence in the heart of Bangkok, this elegant urban escape offers convenient access to many of the city's ancient architectural wonders and modern marvels.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Located in the heart of the city, close to Sathorn Road and Taksin Bridge, easy access to Express Way and Sky train.
  • Elegantly appointed and spacious one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments with washers and dryers and room for up to 8 guests.
  • Master bedroom has a king bed, bathroom with separate shower and bathtub.

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Located in the heart of Bangkok, Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place provides convenient access to the city’s modern rail services. Explore this magnificent metropolis and experience its unique and diverse culture. Or retreat from the city and enjoy an array of on-site amenities just steps from your spacious apartment.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Bangkok is a unique blend of Thailand’s past and present. During the day, tour the city and marvel at historic monuments and modern architectural wonders. At night, experience the excitement of the city’s clubs and cafés. You’ll also find plenty of shopping opportunities, including the area’s largest market and urban shopping malls offering virtually anything you can imagine.

MapAndTransportation.drivingDirectionIntroText: From regional airports to local businesses to historic attractions, our interactive map will help you get there with ease.

Resort.name: Marriott's Legends Edge at Bay Point
Resort.intro:
Legendary Vacations

Perched on scenic Grand Lagoon, with soothing lagoon views on one side and stunning golf courses on the other, Marriott's Legends Edge takes vacations to a new extreme. It seems too good to be true — until you're here to live the dream.
Resort.description: On Florida's Gulf Coast, this resort places you amid the quaint waterside community of Bay Point. Enjoy soothing views of St. Andrews Bay as well as golf and endless outdoors activities.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious 2-bedroom/2-bath villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Two spectacular 18-hole golf courses
  • Surrounded by pristine golf greens, stunning pools and meticulously manicured grounds
  • On-site fitness center, many planned children's and family activities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureDisclaimer: Marriott International, Inc., Marriott Vacation Club International and their respective affiliates and subsidiaries, make no warranty, express or implied, as to the condition, capacity, performance or any other aspect of the activities, events, or service providers listed herein. No inquiry has been made into the activities or events, or the qualifications or the quality of services offered by the providers. Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: In addition to spectacular sights, Marriott's Legends Edge treats you to spacious villa comforts, thoughtful services and exceptional features. From manicured fairways to sparkling pools to attentive concierge service, no detail is overlooked.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: There's so much to experience and explore on Florida's magnificent Gulf Coast, from sunning yourself on sugar-white sands at nearby Panama City Beach to golf and soothing views of St. Andrews Bay. For those wanting a little more adventure, a variety of fishing and watersports await you in beautiful Panama City.

Resort.name: Marriott's Playa Andaluza
Resort.intro:
Stay Where the Rich Play

Located on the Costa del Sol of southern Spain, near the “Millionaire’s Paradise” of Puerto Banús, Marriott’s Playa Andaluza a Marriott Vacation Club resort, boasts a spectacularly scenic setting and unique vacation experience that are absolutely priceless.
Resort.description: Located in the charming town of Estepona on the Costa del Sol, this seaside resort is an elegant retreat surrounded by the Mediterranean Sea, shopping and nearly 70 golf courses.
Resort.importantNotice: • Please click here to view our 2017-2018 maintenance schedule.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

Elegantly appointed, spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Stunning oceanfront resort with beach access, beautiful pools, manicured grounds and panoramic ocean views
  • European luxury spa
  • Near excellent golf courses, restaurants and cultural attractions
  • Onsite restaurant for breakfast, lunch and dinner, The Marketplace convenience store, fitness center, planned children's/family activities

    • Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Experience ultimate comfort and relaxation as you're surrounded by the splendor of southern Spain. Every aspect of this resort - from its deluxe accommodations to attentive services -is designed to maximize your satisfaction and enjoyment here.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Spain's “sun coast" shines with attractions and adventures. Visit old Seville and tour its gigantic cathedral, play spectacular golf courses, sample the glittering nightlife of Puerto Ban's, take a daytrip to Tangiers, or learn to flamenco and relax right here.

Resort.name: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse℠, New York City
Resort.intro: Your very own slice of the Big Apple.
Resort.description:
After a full day of adventures in the city, relax in your beautifully appointed room or — better yet — in one of New York City’s most spectacular rooftop bars, your very own urban oasis.
Learn more about Marriott Vacation Club Pulse.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, New York City puts you at the center of the action in one of the world’s most vibrant cities. Owners will have access to this historic property through the Marriott Vacation Club DestinationsTM Exchange Program.

  • Relax in your beautifully appointed room or — better yet — in one of New York City’s most spectacular rooftop bars, your very own urban oasis
  • Within walking distance of flagship retail stores, beautiful Bryant Park, and the bustle of Times Square
  • Take in an iconic Broadway show. Explore the renowned Garment District — the global epicenter of fashion and design — or immerse yourself in art, history and culture by experiencing New York City’s internationally acclaimed museums and exhibits.

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureDisclaimer: Marriott International, Inc., Marriott Vacation Club International and their respective affiliates and subsidiaries, make no warranty, express or implied, as to the condition, capacity, performance or any other aspect of the activities, events, or service providers listed herein. Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Within walking distance of flagship retail stores, beautiful Bryant Park, and the bustle of Times Square, Marriott Vacation Club Pulse<sup>SM</sup>, New York City makes it easy to feel the thrill of mingling with locals and tourists alike at the Crossroads of the World.

Resort.name: Marriott's Waiohai Beach Club
Resort.intro:
Distinctively Hawaiian

Perfectly situated on Kauai, the most distinctively Hawaiian of the Pacific isles, Marriott's Waiohai Beach Club is a tropical paradise that beckons visitors year after year.
Resort.description: Adjacent to the golden sands of Poipu Beach, this vacation paradise provides unforgettable views. Spend your days oceanside or explore rugged cliffs, towering waterfalls and lush foliage.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Elegantly appointed and spacious 2-bedroom/2-bath villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Spectacular beachfront resort with lush grounds and 3 large outdoor pools
  • Located near many of the world's most acclaimed and scenic golf courses
  • Restaurant, The Marketplacesm convenience store, fitness center and children/family activities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary:
Nestled on one of the world's most beautiful islands, Marriott's Waiohai Beach Club offers accommodations, services and amenities of equally exceptional status. Experience Kauai in all its sun-drenched splendor for years to come.

Redeem Vacation Club Points for resort credit for on-site experiences and more at this property. View list of options.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Experience Kauai on foot, horseback, kayak, ATV, helicopter or from your private lanai. Play the world-famous courses, lounge on the exotic beaches. Embrace authentic Polynesian culture and witness island sunsets like nowhere else on earth.

Resort.name: The Ritz-Carlton Club, Aspen Highlands
Resort.intro:
Live your dreams amid majestic mountains and natural splendor

Situated at the base of a 12,500 foot mountain, The Ritz-Carlton Club, Aspen Highlands features stunning views. Grow accustomed to your ski valet greeting you each day or pursue pure relaxation and renewal in our pool areas of at the well-appointed spa and fitness center. With a special mix of authentic Western ambience and renowned Ritz-Carlton service, Aspen Highlands is a place where visitors return again and again.
Resort.description: Elevate your next vacation with legendary service in The Ritz-Carlton<sup>®</sup> tradition. This luxury ski-in/ski-out resort sits at the foot of a 12,500-foot mountain with stunning views and 125 trails.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Luxuriously-appointed 2- and 3-bedroom residences
  • Dedicated concierge
  • At-your-service ski valet
  • State-of-the-art fitness center
  • On-site bistro

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Aspen is a recreational, social and cultural mecca for people from all around the globe. It's celebrated for many things including world-class skiing and snowboarding, acclaimed cuisine and one-of-a-kind shopping.

Resort.name: Marriott's OceanWatch at Grande Dunes
Resort.intro:
A Charming Seaside Retreat

Marriott's OceanWatch at Grande Dunes® offers variety, with a choice of two great worlds, Seaside Villas located right on the white sand beach of South Carolina's Grand Strand in Myrtle Beach and Woodsy Villas nestled among natural sand dunes and beautiful live oak trees. There is not a more luxurious or picturesque resort to stay and play in one of America's premier seaside destinations.
Resort.description: This beachfront resort is ideally located near the best golf, beaches and attractions. Its classic Mediterranean architecture and beautiful ocean views make it a stylish and soothing escape.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and elegantly appointed 2-bedroom villas and guestrooms
  • Located within the exceptional Grande Dunes master-planned community
  • Area attractions include 120+ golf courses, outlet shopping and a dazzling array of dining, shopping and nightlife
  • The Marketplace and Grillesm, fitness center and many planned children's and family activities

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary:
Near all the famous attractions of Myrtle Beach, this resort boasts tremendous amenities and services all its own. You'll fall in love with the beautiful setting and these exceptional accommodations, finding plenty to see and do right here.

Redeem Vacation Club Points for resort credit for on-site experiences and more at this property. View list of options.

Resort.name: Marriott's Grande Ocean
Resort.intro:
Where Life is Grande

With its gleaming white villas overlooking miles of gorgeous Atlantic beaches, Marriott's Grande Ocean resort transports you into a deep state of relaxation and serenity. Vacationing on Hilton Head Island doesn't get any finer than this.
Resort.description: This charming retreat enjoys a coveted beachfront location. Nearby you'll discover challenging golf as well as outdoor activities and attractions to entertain the entire family.
Resort.importantNotice: Please note the indoor pool will be undergoing renovation from August 28, 2017 through October 28, 2017 from the hours of 9:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Adult swim times will be available at the outdoor lap pool and south pool. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

  • Beautiful oceanfront resort with Atlantic beach access, meticulously maintained grounds and pools

Resort.name: Marriott's Monarch
Resort.intro:
Rising Above

Spread across six oceanfront acres in Hilton Head Island's renowned Sea Pines Plantation, Marriott's Monarch sets hearts flutter. Let this resort's stunning setting, wonderful accommodations and gracious services sweep you off your feet.
Resort.description: This retreat is set along six oceanfront acres and puts you within reach of challenging golf and miles of nature trails. Or just relax on the beach or by one of the resort's two refreshing pools.
Resort.importantNotice:
Please note there are substantial exterior façade and interior renovations scheduled from January 6, 2018 through March 9, 2018. As a result, the Azalea and Camellia buildings will be closed during that time. Guests may expect loud noise to be associated with this project. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Check-in will be at Marriott's Monarch (the Welcome Center has closed). When you enter Sea Pines, you will need to pay the $6.00 entrance fee per car. At check-in, you will be given two gate passes that will allow entry to Sea Pines Plantation. Guests will be provided with parking passes for up to two vehicles to park at Monarch. No commercial or company vehicles allowed.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and elegantly appointed 2-bedroom/2-bath villas accommodate up to 6 guests
  • Nonsmoking resort
  • Spectacular oceanfront resort beside expansive Atlantic Ocean beach
  • Beautifully landscaped and wooded grounds with swimming pool and natural ponds
  • Located near many world-class golf courses, restaurants and recreational areas
  • On-site fitness center and planned family and children's activities

Resort.name: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse℠ at The Mayflower, Washington, D.C.
Resort.intro:
A Landmark Vacation Awaits

Marriott Vacation Club Pulse at The Mayflower, Washington, D.C. sets the stage for remarkable vacations. Located in the heart of Washington, D.C., the iconic Mayflower hotel is proudly listed on the National Register of Historic Places.
Resort.description:
Offering an incredible downtown location, the iconic Mayflower hotel is proudly listed on the National Register of Historic Places. During your stay, you can enjoy refined luxury and thoughtful amenities that will enhance your stay in Washington, D.C.
Learn more about Marriott Vacation Club Pulse.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Property-at-a-Glance

  • Updated room design that blends historic luxury and modern style
  • Located in the heart of the downtown district, steps away from Dupont Circle
  • Surrounded by historic attractions, cultural arts venues, famous shopping, dining and more

PL-16-019

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureDisclaimer: PL-16-019
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse at The Mayflower, Washington, D.C. puts you in the heart of historic Washington, D.C., close to the city's most famous landmarks as well as upscale shopping and dining. The Mayflower hotel also features thoughtful services and amenities that will enhance your urban getaway.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: From your comfortable home base, explore the historic sites, cultural offerings and world-class shopping and dining of the nation's capital. All the city's famous attractions await your discovery, from the White House to the Smithsonian and the National Mall.

Resort.name: Marriott's Marbella Beach Resort
Resort.intro:
Southern Spain Mystique

Located on shimmering Costa del Sol, Marriott’s Marbella Beach Resort, a Marriott Vacation Club resort, captures the powerful allure and romance of southern Spain. Experience all the charm and romance of this magical Mediterranean seaside resort.
Resort.description: Located in the heart of the Costa del Sol, this relaxing seaside resort reflects the enduring romance of southern Spain. Explore the countryside on horseback, golf or enjoy nearby nightlife.
Resort.importantNotice: Please click here to view our 2017-2018 maintenance schedule.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and elegantly appointed 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom apartments accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Spectacular seaside Mediterranean resort with beachfront access and panoramic ocean views
  • Expansive, lavishly landscaped grounds with multiple pools amid lush gardens and palms
  • Near many world-class golf courses, spas and cultural attractions
  • Many restaurants and lounges, The Marketplacesm convenience store, fitness center, planned children’s/family activities

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Southern Spain's renowned charm is matched by the luxurious accommodations, many pampered services and exceptional amenities this resort provides. Experience the centuries-old mystique of the Mediterranean at a place you will not soon forget.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: The experiences awaiting here are countless. You can ride a donkey through ancient Miha Village, tour nearby Ronda by horse carriage, take a day trip to exotic Tangiers, golf magnificent courses, sip wine and sample tapas by the sea, just to name a few.

Resort.name: Marriott's StreamSide
Resort.intro:
Alpine Wonders, Unveiled

Tucked into the world-famous ski village of Vail, Colorado, is Marriott's StreamSide, the perfect place to base your alpine retreat. Countless adventures are just outside your door, while exceptional calm and comfort await inside your villa.
Resort.description: Surrounded by skyscraping mountains, this resort is ideally located for exploring an array of year-round leisure possibilities, from challenging ski slopes to the vast unspoiled wilderness.
Resort.importantNotice: Please note there is an enhancement project scheduled for the three spa areas around the StreamSide property beginning on May 1, 2017 with an estimated completion date of September 31, 2017. During this time, the spa areas will be closed. However, the indoor/outdoor pool and the two spas located at the Clubhouse will continue to be available for guest use during normal operating hours 8 a.m. - 11p.m. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Elegantly appointed, spacious villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Located in exciting Vail yet secluded in its own rustic and quiet enclave
  • Exceptional skiing at many adjacent resorts
  • Large, heated indoor/outdoor pool, hot tub, on-site fitness center and racquetball facility
  • Vail has many excellent golf courses, dining options and outdoors recreation venues

Resort.name: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse℠, San Diego
Resort.intro:
Escape in Style

Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, San Diego is a true escape that will greet you with a perfect blend of historic ambiance and contemporary design. Inspired by San Diego’s renowned Gaslamp Quarter, many of the 264 well-appointed suites feature stunning San Diego views and atmospheric wood and metal finishes. Enjoy this sleek, sophisticated setting to unwind from a day of exploration and recharge before venturing out to experience San Diego’s amazing nightlife.
Resort.description:
Your stylish downtown San Diego retreat offers an ideal central location for exploring all that San Diego has to offer, from the bustling Gaslamp Quarter with its colorful array of award-winning restaurants, rooftop bars, happening nightclubs, art galleries and boutiques, to Balboa Park, home to many of San Diego’s museums and cultural venues as well as the legendary San Diego Zoo.
Learn more about Marriott Vacation Club Pulse.
Resort.importantNotice:
Please note, the indoor pool and whirlpool will be closed for resurfacing from October 15th, 2017 through December 1, 2017. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Valet parking is available curbside on A Street by ACE Parking at $42 per night starting January 1, 2018 with in and out privileges, and self-parking is available in the Symphony Tower parking garage at $35 per day. The self-parking entrance is on Seventh Avenue and is a very tight corkscrew up from street level to Level 11. For that reason, Larger vehicles are not recommended.

Our suites, which average 430 square feet, offer a kitchenette. They do NOT have full kitchens a stove/oven or cooktop, but instead they offer a microwave, mini-refrigerator, coffee maker, dishwasher, toaster and tableware. Our suites do not have a washer or dryer, however we have laundry facilities on property and dry cleaning services are available for a fee.

  • 264 suites
  • Complimentary Wi-Fi all rooms and public spaces
  • The famous Gaslamp Quarter with its colorful array of award-winning restaurants, rooftop bars, happening nightclubs, art galleries and boutiques is just a stroll away
Features, furnishings and amenities are subject to change

Resort.name: Marriott's Fairway Villas
Resort.intro:
Bayfront Bounty

Across the bay from Atlantic City, Marriott's Fairway Villas, a Marriott Vacation Club® resort, exudes town-and-country charm, bayfront beauty, exceptional golf and many other recreations. Make this your seaside retreat for vacations as relaxing as they are memorable.
Resort.description: Across the bay from Atlantic City, you'll find this stately resort among natural woodlands. It offers a classic golf club experience and the pleasures of the on-site Elizabeth Arden Red Door Spa.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and elegantly appointed 2-bedroom villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Adjacent to the Seaview Resort & Spa with privileged access to the Pines and Bay courses at the Seaview Resort & Spa
  • Gorgeous Plantation-style resort on scenic grounds with several indoor and outdoor pools and golf-course views
  • On-site restaurant, The Marketplace Expresssm convenience store and fitness center

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: This resort's gracious countryside setting is matched by its stylish accommodations and attentive services. Your retreats to this charming place are always leisurely, comfortable, completely satisfying and seemingly over much too soon.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Cross the bay to play and see shows at the famed Atlantic City Boardwalk and casinos, or comb the 127-mile coastline to find your perfect beach. Also see famous lighthouses, visit historic towns, or enjoy the world-class golf and spa right here.

Resort.name: Marriott's Desert Springs Villas
Resort.intro:
Oasis of Vacation Pleasures

Surrounded by the glittering Palm Desert and tucked among scenic mountains, Marriott's Desert Springs Resort beckons sun seekers, spa goers and golf lovers alike. Here, you'll see why California remains a dream destination for so many.
Resort.description: Discover endless recreation, shopping and dining options enhanced by vibrant desert views. Plus you'll enjoy many of the perks at the nearby JW Marriott<sup>®</sup> Desert Springs Resort & Spa.
Resort.importantNotice:
Our resort is undergoing various phases of construction throughout the year, including villa and street refurbishments. Guests may expect intermittent noise due to the use of construction machinery for all projects. We thank you for understanding and apologize for any inconvenience.

Marriott's Desert Springs Villas is currently undergoing villa renovations that will last through October, 2018. Some noise may be heard during the hours of 8 a.m. - 6:30 p.m.

Please note that there are two popular music festivals that occur during the month of April. The Coachella Music Festival dates are April 13th – 15th and April 20th– 22nd in 2018. The dates for the Stagecoach Music Festival in 2018 are April 27th – 29th. Guests can expect above average traffic in and around the area during the aforementioned dates.

Reminder, use of amenities at the JW Desert Springs Marriott Resort and Spa are subject to seasonal availability and/or blackout dates. Fees may apply, inquire at check-in.

  • Elegantly appointed, 2-bedroom villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Surrounded by seven luxurious outdoor pools, complete with poolside grill and bar
  • World-class golf at the JW Marriott Desert Springs Resort & Spa and other local courses
  • On-site restaurants, The Marketplacesm store, fitness center, and planned kid's activities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Resort.name: Marriott's Club Son Antem
Resort.intro:
Mediterranean Masterpiece

Located on an island off coast of Spain, situated in the beautiful countryside with views of rugged mountains in the distance, the townhouses of Marriott's Club Son Antem, a Marriott Vacation Club resort, in Mallorca represent the ultimate in Mediterranean charm.
Resort.description: The resort is located on the island of Mallorca with its majestic mountains and sheltered coves in the Mediterranean Sea. You may enjoy many of the amenities at the Son Antem Golf Club and spa.
Resort.importantNotice:
Please note that the indoor pool, La Terrassa Restaurant, and the Massage & Beauty area will be closed between January 9, 2017 and February 9, 2017 due to construction efforts in the spa building. From February 1, 2017 to March 31, 2017, the spa building will be operative again; however, some renovation work will continue being performed.

Annual maintenance on the spa pool is scheduled to begin January 8, 2018 with an estimated completion date of January 31, 2018. While the impact is expected to be minimal, guests may observe construction related activities/noise over the course of the project.

The West golf course will be closed starting June 5, 2017 with an estimated completion date of August 31, 2017 to replace the turf on the greens. A turf variety with higher tolerance to warm climate and disease has been selected to provide a putting surface that is more uniform and homogeneous. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and elegantly appointed 2- and 3-bedroom townhouses accommodate up to 8 people
  • Deluxe townhouse accommodations with private terrace/garden area with gas grill
  • Spectacular Mediterranean resort featuring two 18-hole golf courses and luxury spa
  • Expansive, beautiful manicured grounds with indoor and outdoor pools
  • Restaurants and lounges, fitness center, The Marketplacesm convenience store, Kid's Club

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Resort.name: Marriott's Canyon Villas
Resort.intro:
Desert Splendor and Wonders

Set in the enchanted Sonoran Desert of Phoenix, Arizona is the spectacular vacation oasis known as Marriott's Canyon Villas at Desert Ridge. Enjoy all its natural beauty, serenity and host of activities every day and night that you stay here.
Resort.description: Woven into the Sonoran Desert, this refreshing oasis offers majestic views of crimson mountains and fiery Arizona sunsets. Plus the Wildfire Golf Club with two courses is steps from your door.
Resort.importantNotice:
Please note that construction efforts for the plaground, lawn area, and main pool deck are scheduled for the resort starting September 1, 2017 to December 15, 2017. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Please note, the use of the pool(s) at the JW Desert Ridge Resort & Spa are subject to seasonal availability and/or blackout dates. Fees may apply, inquire at check-in.

  • Beautifully appointed guestrooms,1- and 2-bedroom villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Large, heated pool with scenic waterfall and whirlpool, plus separate children's pools
  • World-class golf at the Wildfire Golf Club with Palmer and Faldo courses
  • The Marketplace Expresssm store, fitness center and planned kids activities

Resort.name: Marriott's Sunset Pointe
Resort.intro:
Sunset Serenade

Tucked into picturesque Shelter Cove Harbour, Marriott's Sunset Pointe puts you in the heart of Hilton Head Island's world-famous recreations. At the same time, you're serenely secluded at this peaceful, private and scenic resort.
Resort.description: Enjoy deep-sea fishing, strolling along picturesque shores, championship golf and more. This resort's central location in Shelter Cove Harbour is ideal for exploring everything in the area.
Resort.importantNotice: Please note the resort will be undergoing a villa refurbishment project beginning January 6, 2018. The villa refurbishment project will be completed in phases, with an estimated project completion date of February 23, 2018. During this time, guests may expect construction related activities/noise. Most of the heavy construction activity will likely occur during the hours of 9:00 a.m.- 6:00 p.m., seven days a week. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Resort.name: Marriott's Timber Lodge
Resort.intro:
Heaven for Vacationers

Perfectly nestled in the new Heavenly® Village at the heart of Lake Tahoe's amazing South Shore is Marriott's Timber Lodge. A vacation paradise for skiers, golfers, spa goers, show seekers and outdoor enthusiasts alike.
Resort.description: From downhill skiing, snowboarding and cross-country skiing to golfing, boating and hiking, this year-round resort is ideal for exploring Lake Tahoe's endless outdoor activities.
Resort.importantNotice: Please note renovation efforts have been scheduled at our resort. These efforts will begin September 5, 2017 with an anticipated completion date of November 20, 2017. Renovations will resume on March 19, 2018 with an estimated completion date of June 26, 2018. Guests can expect construction related activities/noise between the hours of 7 a.m. - 7 p.m., Monday through Sunday. Resort amenities will not be affected. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious, elegantly appointed 1-, 2 - and 3-bedroom villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Easy access to world-renowned skiing at South Lake Tahoe from Heavenly???? Village
  • Year round recreation includes world-class golf, spas, watersports, hiking, fishing, more
  • Large, heated pool, whirlpools, fitness center and separate children's pool and activities

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: The new ski village of Heavenly® is aptly named to describe the service and accommodations you'll find at Marriott's Timber Lodge. The cozy comfort of your villa and the convenient on-site amenities may make it hard to come back down to earth.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: Lake Tahoe offers magnificent year-round skiing, snowboarding and more. Year round you and your family can enjoy exploring the area's beauty by boat or trail to basking in hot springs to enjoying the many cultural arts and historic attractions.

Resort.name: The Ritz-Carlton Club, Vail
Resort.intro:
A dream-like mountain oasis where shared adventures become lasting memories

Vail has long been considered one of the world's most desired ski destinations-and now it has been elevated to a new level of luxury with The Ritz-Carlton Club ®, Vail. You will enjoy unfettered access to Vail Mountain, along with the personal attention and renowned services and amenities exclusive to The Ritz-Carlton®.
Resort.description: Located at the base of Vail Mountain in LionsHead Village, this elegant mountain resort retreat puts you in the center of everything, while providing enviable amenities and personalized service delivered in the tradition of The Ritz-Carlton<sup>®</sup>.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Luxurious 2- and 3-bedroom residences include a separate living room, dining area, fully equipped kitchen and private balcony
  • Discover a mountain retreat in one of the world's most desirable ski destinations
  • Savor delectable cuisine at our onsite Lobby Lounge, enjoy the convenience of an in-residence Chef's dinner or sample one of the area's tempting restaurants
  • Unwind with refreshing swim in the outdoor pool

Resort.name: Marriott's Harbour Club
Resort.intro:
Your Ship Has Come In

Nestled in Hilton Head Island's Sea Pines Plantation and overlooking scenic Calibogue Sound, Marriott's Harbour Club is an ideal seaside getaway. Majestic vistas and world-class recreation abound here as your cares drift away.
Resort.description: From sophisticated shopping and dining to lots of family-friendly activities, you'll discover easy access to everything from this charming resort within The Sea Pines Plantation.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious and elegantly appointed 2-bedroom/2-bath villas accommodate up to 8 guests
  • Located near many world-class golf courses, restaurants and recreational areas
  • On-site fitness center and planned family and children's activities

ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Its private setting overlooking the sound renders this resort a wonderfully serene retreat-further complemented by the luxurious accommodations, thoughtful amenities and gracious services you'll enjoy here, day after relaxing day.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: When you're not on the island's many challenging golf courses, delve into South Carolina Low-Country excursions-from kayak tours to leisurely horseback rides, from day trips to Savannah to summer fireworks at Shelter Cove.

Resort.name: Marriott's Shadow Ridge
Resort.intro:
Shaded by Grandeur

Nestled at the feet of the majestic Sierra Nevada Mountains, Marriott's Shadow Ridge is a glorious sight to behold and magnificent place to be. Enjoy vacations full of fun and sun, with memories that linger like sunsets on these mountaintops.
Resort.description: Nestled at the foothills of the Santa Rosa and San Jacinto mountains, this resort offers 18 holes of championship golf and other activities surrounded by serene views of the desert. You can also elevate your game at the on-site Marriott Golf Academy<sup><small>SM</small></sup>.
Resort.importantNotice: Please click here to view our 2017 maintenance schedule.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Elegant guestrooms, and spacious 1- and 2-bedroom villas accommodate 2-8 guests
  • World-class golf at Shadow Ridge Golf Club
  • Gorgeous outdoor pools, whirlpools, and the Shadow Ridge Health club with tennis
  • Restaurants, The Marketplacesm store, fitness center and planned kids activities

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary:
At the desert's edge is an amazing resort surrounded by a myriad of recreational and cultural treasures. What's more, the resort itself centers its attention on you- with a host of gracious services and amenities that cater to your every need and desire.

Redeem Vacation Club Points for resort credit for on-site experiences and more at this property. View list of options.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: As if playing Nick Faldo's Championship Course wasn't enough, there are lots of other great excursions and diversions nearby. From soaring up the Palm Springs Tramway to glorious hiking and superb shopping, there's never a dull moment here.

Resort.name: Marriott's BeachPlace Towers
Resort.intro:
South Florida

With an endless, sun-drenched beach on one side and the shimmering Intracoastal Waterway on the other, Marriott’s BeachPlace Towers is at the heart of south Florida’s diverse array of culture and entertainment.
Resort.description: Explore miles of tranquil beaches on Florida's Gold Coast. This resort overlooks both the Atlantic Ocean and Intracoastal Waterway and is near famed Las Olas Boulevard.
Resort.importantNotice:
Marriott's BeachPlace Towers will be completing a building facade painting and waterproofing project from November 11, 2017 to March 17, 2018. The project is currently scheduled to occur daily between 9:00 a.m.-6:00 p.m., and guests may experience periodic closure of portions of the pool/ pool deck, the presence of contractors on the exterior of villas, and light construction-related noise. For further information, please contact the resort at (954) 525-4440.

Please note, refurbishment activity will begin on May 12, 2018 with an estimated completion date of October 31, 2018. Guests may expect light construction noise/activities during the hours of 9 a.m.- 5 p.m. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

All registered guests are eligible for one parking space per villa. The parking fee is $14 per day, however, the fee is waived for Marriott's BeachPlace Towers Owners using their deeded BeachPlace Towers week(s) to occupy or exchange back into the resort.

Due to the high volume of visitors in Fort Lauderdale during this time, we anticipate heavy traffic and delays. Please allow additional time to get to your destination. We thank you for your understanding and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

ResortData.resortAtAGlance:
Resort-At-a-Glance

  • Spacious 2-bedroom/2-bath Atlantic beachfront villas for up to 8 guests
  • Accommodations in a high-energy urban setting with exciting beach nightlife, seaside activities and world-famous shopping and dining
  • Nestled conveniently atop three floors of exclusive designer retail shops
  • On-site pool, restaurants and lounges with world-class golf and spas nearby

Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.

No inquiry has been made into the activities or events, or the qualifications or the quality of services offered by the providers. Do not consider this an endorsement of or recommendation for any of the activities, events, or providers. Features, furnishings and amenities may be proposed and are subject to change.
ResortFeatures.resortFeatureSummary: Marriott's BeachPlace Towers places you in the middle of exciting Fort Lauderdale, right on the beach next to its bustling shops and clubs. It also boasts a long list of pampering services and convenient amenities - making it an exceptional place to stay and play.

LocalActivities.localActivitiesIntro: There's so much to experience and explore in Fort Lauderdale, from sunning yourself at the beach to practicing your putt at top golf courses to indulging at famous spas. This exciting city offers deep-sea fishing, gallery hopping and everything in between.
