Airports.drivingDirection: Start going North toward East Plumb Lane -- 0.3 miTake the I-580N/US-395N ramp on the left to I-80/Reno/Sparks/Truckee -- 341 ftKeep right at the fork and merge onto I-580N/US-395N -- 2.7 miTake exit 68B to merge onto I-80W toward Sacremento entering California -- 32.0 miTake exit 188 for CA-89/CA-267 toward Sierraville/Lake Taho, at bottom of off ramp turn left onto CA-267S -- 6.2 miYou will hit Northstar Drive at a light and find signs to Northstar at Tahoe Go straight past and take your first right onto Highlands Drive*** (you will find a big sign that says Ritz-Carlton Highlands, Lake Tahoe and at the bottom, Northstar HighlandsFollow the road all the way up, you will find another sign for The Ritz-Carlton, turn left onto the road -- 2.9 miYou will find signs to The Ritz-Carlton Club, follow signs, stay to the right, go past the loading dock of the Hotel, up the winding road, the Club is at the top of the Highlands Gondola***If chain controls are in placeTurn RIGHT on Northstar Drive -- 0.2 miWhen you reach the ROUNDABOUT, proceed three-quarters of the way around the ROUNDABOUT and turn RIGHT on Ridgeline Drive -- 0.5 miWhen Ridgeline Drive dead ends, turn RIGHT on Highlands View Road and proceed as above.

Take the first right turn onto Greenwood Drive. At the Sea Pines gate pay the USD 6 fee and turn right onto Plantation Drive. Turn right at the stop sign onto Lighthouse Road. The hotel is one-half mile on the right. Lobby phone number 843-363-3020.

Take the Interstate 10 West exit toward Los Angeles then merge onto Interstate 10 East. Follow Interstate 10 East to the Monterey Avenue exit and turn right. Travel on Monterey Avenue for 1.5 miles to Shadow Ridge Road and turn left.

Airports.drivingDirection: Exit airport, turn left on El Cielo. Go approx. 1/2 mile (6 /10ths) to Ramon Road. Turn left on Ramon Road, go 6 miles to I-10. The entrance is on the right approx. 1/2 mile past Country Club Drive. Turn right onRiviera Drive.

Airports.drivingDirection: Take Exit 8 in South Carolina (Highway 278). Go East on Hwy 278 for approx. 20 miles. Go over two consecutive bridges that span the Inter Coastal waterway onto Hilton Head Island. As you reach the division of Hwy 278, stay in the right lane, following the signs for Hwy 278 business (William Hilton Parkway). Continue on William Hilton Pkwy, until the entrance to Port Royal Plantation which will be on your left. At traffic light, turn left and enter Port Royal Plantation. Turn left at 2nd road on left. Follow this road to the stop sign, turn right. Go through tunnel, turn right into the resort. If you are arriving after hours, press call button on keypad outside guardhouse to reach a resort associate to raise entrance gate.

Continue on William Hilton Pkwy, until the entrance to Port Royal Plantation which will be on your left. At traffic light, turn left and enter Port Royal Plantation. Turn left at 2nd road on left. Follow this road to the stop sign, turn right. Go through tunnel, turn right into the resort. If you are arriving after hours, press call button on keypad outside guardhouse to reach a resort associate to raise entrance gate.

Airports.drivingDirection: From Interstate 95 take exit 8 and continue for approximately 30 minutes on Highway 278. Turn right and pass through the Sea Pines rear gate. The entrance fee is USD 6 per car. Monarch villas will be one mile on the left.

Travel 3.7 miles then exit LEFT on Collins Avenue. Continue on Collins Avenue for 0.8 mile then turn right onto 14th St. Turn left onto Ocean Dr. and the resort will be on the left.

Airports.drivingDirection: Exit E. Airport Drive to S. Archibald Ave. to I-10 East. Take I-10 for 78 miles to Cook St. exit. Exit Cook Street go right and proceed 2 1/2 miles to the Villas entrance. The entrance is on Cook Street, on the right side of the street 1/2 mile past Country Club Drive.
Airports.drivingDirection2: Exit E. Airport Drive to S. Archibald Ave. to I-10 East. Take I-10 for 78 miles to Cook St. exit. Exit Cook Street go right and proceed 2 1/2 miles to the Villas entrance. The entrance is on Cook Street, on the right side of the street 1/2 mile past Country Club Drive.

Airports.drivingDirection: Follow signs to 1-75 South. Merge onto 1-75 S. Go approx. 27 miles to Exit 101 (CR 951 S/Collier Blvd). Merge onto CR-951 S towards Marco Island. Resort will be approx. 18 miles on the right.

Turn right onto the service road for Thomas Drive/NSA Main gate/Bay Point. Turn left/east onto Front Beach Road. Stay to the right of the overpass ramp and continue east to Thomas Drive. Turn right onto Thomas Drive. Turn left onto Magnolia Beach Road. Magnolia Beach Road will veer to the right and change its name to Delwood Beach Road. Turn right onto Jan Cooley Road. Turn right and drive through the Bay Point resort's main gate. Turn left at the traffic circle and continue to Marriott's Legends Edge at Bay Point (4000 Marriott Drive).

Airports.drivingDirection:

  • Pay Tolls Online or with Free App! All drivers must pay tolls electronically - no cash. Visitors and infrequent drivers of The Toll Roads must pay online or via the free app using the One-Time-Toll® payment option. Tolls must be paid within 5 days before or 5 days after driving the roads to avoid receiving a violation notice. Download the app, "The Toll Roads" in the Apple or Google Play Stores.

Airports.drivingDirection: Follow signs to I-95 North to South Carolina. Once, in South Carolina, take Exit 8, Highway 278 East to Hilton Head Island (approximately 20 miles). After crossing the two consecutive bridges onto Hilton Head Island, follow 278 East Business - William Hilton Parkway (not Highway 278 Toll) for 6.3 miles. Just past the intersection at Mathews Drive/Folly Field Road, take the second left onto Burkes Beach Road. Take the first left onto Fifth Street and the resort gatehouse will be located straight ahead. If arrive after hours, press call button on the keypad to reach a resort associate to raise the entrance gate.

Airports.drivingDirection: Driving Directions: Exit the Airport and make a right at the light. Continue on this road for several miles as you drive on the waterfront. You will pass a police station at a light on your left. At the next light, make a right. You will pass "Yacht Haven Grande" on your right. At the second light, continue straight into "Havensight." At the top of the hill make a left. Stay on this for several miles. You will pass "Iggies" on your right and then "Gas Works." When you come to a "T" at the "Bridge to Nowhere," make a right. Continue on this road as you passâ€š "Food Center" on your left. About a quarter of a mile after the National Armory make a right up a small hill. If you pass the high school on your left you have gone too far. Continue straight on this road and pass The Ritz-Carlton Hotel. The entrance to The Ritz-Carlton Club will be shortly after. *Remember to stay on the left!

  • Keiki Playground
    • Sports and Fitness
  • Fitness Center - Featuring a wide selection of Life Fitness cardiovascular and strengthening equipment
  • The Wellness Center - Chose from a variety of fitness and wellness classes designed by fitness expert, David Wicker, including:
    • White Tiger Yoga & Tai Chi: Gentle, yet challenging posture and breathing strategies for balance, flexibility and inner calm.
    • Water Fitness: Tone the back of your arms, legs, stomach and more. Ideal to increase muscle tone and range of motion.
    • Healthy Lower Back: Learn how to release the tight muscles in your legs and hips that attach to your lower back, causing discomfort.
    • Healthy Shoulder & Rotator Cuff: Learn how to increase blood flow to the rotator cuff for less pain and increase range of motion, while relieving stress in your shoulder blade area.
    • Healthy Weight Loss & Muscle Tone: Dispel the common myths about diet and fitness, and teach you how to cut belly fat and tone your body the healthy way - without a gym!
    • Beach Amenities
  • Beachfront access

The Bistro

New American cuisine with contemporary influences. Whimsical in design, the restaurant's intimate dining room features a variety of special places for unique experiences, a built—in bench attached to the fireplace for romantic fireside chats and a mesmerizing fresh water fish tank.

Outdoor café dining is available during the warmer months.

Seasonal and Subject to Change.
  • Breakfast hours:
    • 7 - 10:30 a.m. (Monday—Saturday)
  • Lunch hours:
    • 11:30 a.m. - 2:30 p.m. (Monday—Friday)
  • Dinner hours:
    • 5 - 10 p.m. (Monday - Friday)
    • 6 - 9 p.m. (Saturday)
  • Brunch:
    • 9 a.m. - 3 p.m. (Sunday)
  • Dress Code:
    • Business Casual

Top of the Strand

The elevator releases you to the 21st level, leaving you face—to—façade with the Top of the Strand's most notable regular — the 102—story Empire State Building, holding court just beyond the slide—away glass ceiling. This intimate cocktail loft belies its almost—too—perfect NYC sightlines and chic—ness with a surprisingly unpretentious vibe.

Midtown locals and hotel guests lounge on comfy patterned banquettes straddling a garden—like oasis of greenery, privately delighted to have found a rooftop oasis away from the crowds and confusion of the Times Square bar scene.

"New York City’s best year-round rooftop bar." — New York Magazine.

"One of the TOP 10 rooftop bars in the world." — Premier Traveler Magazine.

  • Open daily:
    • 5 p.m. - midnight*
  • Dress Code:
    • Business Casual
*Subject to change and exclusive events
Features furnishings and amenities are subject to change.

MVWCTransportInfo.airportName: Northwest Florida Beaches International Airport - ECP
MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Leaving Northwest Florida Beaches Int'l Airport, take a RIGHT (West) on Hwy 388. Turn LEFT (South) on Hwy 79. Turn LEFT (East) on Hwy 98 (Panama City Beach Pkwy). Turn RIGHT on the service road for THOMAS DR / NSA MAIN GATE / BAY POINT. Turn LEFT (East) on Front Beach Rd. Stay to the RIGHT of the overpass ramp and continue East to Thomas Dr. Turn RIGHT on Thomas Dr. Turn LEFT on Magnolia Bch Rd. Magnolia Beach will veer to the RIGHT and change names to Delwood Beach Rd.Turn RIGHT on Jan Cooley Rd. Turn RIGHT into the main gate. Turn LEFT at traffic circle and continue on to Legends Edge (4000 Marriott Dr.).
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Alternate Transportation: Affordable Limousine
  • Estimated taxi fare: 20 USD(one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation: • Bus Station—Greyhound bus lines 11.7 miles E
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • Complimentary on-site parking

MVWCTransportInfo.airportName: Salt Lake City International Airport - SLC
MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Exit the airport onto 1-80 east towards Cheyenne to Kimball Junction, exit number 145. Turn south onto state road 224. Continue approximately 6 miles to Deer Valley Drive, turn left onto Deer Valley Drive. Go approximately 8/10 of a mile. Entrance to resort is on the right. Pull into circular drive to register with the Front Desk (Lodge Building).@
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Contact Concierge Services at 435-647-4100 for information on transportation
  • Estimated taxi fare: $75-$85 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• On-site parking, fee: 15 USD daily
  • One complimentary vehicle per 2-bedroom villa

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Take Airport road to highway 278. Turn East. Follow 278 approximitly 9 miles to the Seapines Traffic Circle. Follow the traffic circle to Pope Avenue. Follow Pope Avenue until it ends at Coligny Circle. Taken Cologiny Circle to South Forrest Beach Drive. Take South Forrest Beach Drive 3/4 of a mile and Grande Ocean will be on the left hand side.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 18 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station—Greyhound 40 miles NE
  • Train Station—Amtrak 58 miles SW
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • Complimentary on-site parking

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Upon exiting Myrtle Bch Int'l Airport, go to 17 Bypass. Turn right on 17 Bypass towards North Myrtle Bch. Stay on 17 Bypass, turn right on 82nd Ave North (Parkway). Follow 82nd Ave North to next traffic light (Business 17/Kings Highway), go through traffic light for approx 1 mile. Make right on Grande Dunes Blvd.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 30 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station—Greyhound Bus 10 miles S
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• For Owners and guests vacationing in the Seaside Villas, parking is available for one vehicle per villa in the garage adjacent to these villas. Secondary vehicles are to be parked in the designated parking area which is the second floor of the "Woodsy" area garage located in the rear of the resort.
  • For Owners and guests vacationing in the Woodsy Villas, street level parking and the "Woodsy" garage is available for your vehicles.
  • Recreational vehicles, mobile homes, trailers, buses, commercial vehicles, etc. cannot be accommodated on site. Please call the resort prior to arrival to obtain information on nearby parking facilities.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: ORY (47 km E) take Freeway A86 direction Creteil, Bobigny - take Freeway A4 direction Metz, Nancy - exit 14 direction Bailly-Romainvilliers Disneyland - first exit right to Bailly-Romainvilliers, at traffic light turn left, at round-about turn left direction Magny-le-Hongre. Resort is on your left at traffic light. Transfer Service from/to Airport upon reservation at cost.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Alternate Transportation: Transfer service or bus
  • Estimated taxi fare: 120.00 EUR (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station—Orme Rond 0.1 miles E
  • Train Station—Marne-la-Vallee Chessy 3.1 miles N
  • Shuttle bus service from the resort to Disneyland is available for a fee. Pick-up the Disneyland shuttle at Disney Winnie parking. Schedule varies, please check availability with the front desk.
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary on-site parking
  • Free parking is available in nearby villages on the street but at car owner's own risk.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From I-95: Take Exit 78A (PGA Boulevard) east, continue for approx. 2 miles to US 1. Cross US 1, which becomes A1A, and continue for 5 miles to Lake Drive (4th traffic signal). Turn left and proceed to end of Lake Drive. Bear left onto Inlet Way. Go to South Ocean Ave, turn left. The resort is approx 1/8 of a mile on right.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 120.00 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Train Station: West Palm Beach (10 mi)
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • Complimentary on-site parking

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From airport turn right onto Dillon Rd. At intersection to William Hilton Parkway/Hwy 278, turn left on 278. Continue on William Hilton Pkwy until the entrance to Port Royal Plantation, which will be on your left. At traffic light, turn left and enter Port Royal Plantation. Take the second left, and follow this road to the stop sign, then turn right. Go through tunnel and turn right into the resort. If you are arriving after hours, press call button on keypad outside guardhouse to reach a resort associate to raise entrance gate.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 15.00 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station:Greyhound Savannah (45 mi)
  • Train Station:Amtrak Savannah (45 mi W)
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • Complimentary on-site parking

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Driving Directions: Exit Kahului Airport on KEOLANI PLACE. Stay in middle lane and continue onto DAIRY RD/HWY 380. DAIRY RD/HWY 380 becomes KUIHELANI RD/HWY 380 at PUUNENE intersection. Continue straight onto KUIHELANI RD/HWY 380 until last traffic signal. Turn LEFT onto HONOAPIILANI HWY/HWY 30 and continue north Proceed toward Lahaina & Ka'anapali. Turn left at traffic light at KAANAPALI PARKWAY, proceed Ã‚Â¼ mile to NOHEA KAI DRIVE, turn left Resort entrance will be on right.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Alternate transportation: Speedy Shuttle Phone: 808-242-7777
  • Bus service, fee: 40 USD (one way)
  • Estimated taxi fare: 100 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Car Rentals (nearby):
    • Hertz
    • National Car Rental
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Valet parking, fee: 19 USD daily
  • Self parking, fee: complimentary*

    • *Rentals will be charged 17 USD daily

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Exit airport, turn left on El Cielo. Go approx. 1/2 mile (6 /10ths) to Ramon Road. Turn left on Ramon Road, go 6 miles to I-10. Take I-10 E for 3 1/2 miles, exit Cook Street go right and proceed 2 1/2 miles to the Villas entrance. The entrance is on Cook Street, on right side of street 1/2 mile past Country Club Drive. The entrance is on the right approx. 1/2 mile past Country Club Drive.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 35.00 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Car Rentals (nearby):
    • Hertz
    • Budget
    • Enterprise
    • Avis
    • Thrifty
    • Dollar Rent A Car
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary on-site parking
  • No RV parking allowed. Vehicle must fit in one parking space.

MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Local taxi service from airport to hotel is THB 500/way or estimated 15 USD
  • Limousine service to and from airport THB 1500 or 45 USD per car per way, 3 people maximum.
  • Van service THB 1500 or 45 USD per van per way, 7 people maximum. Advance reservations through hotel required.
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • Complimentary on-site and valet parking

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Exit Airport and proceed around traffic circle. Follow signs for Route 646 East (Mill Road). Stay on Mill Road East to Route 9 North. Turn left at light onto Route 9. Cross over Route 30 and continue on Route 9 North approximately 2.5 miles. Turn left into Marriott's Fairway Villas and proceed down Fairway Lane to the Registration Building located on the left.

At next traffic light, turn right on Westwood Blvd. Cypress Harbour is located 1 1/2 miles on left. Traveling East on I-4: Take Sea World Exit # 71, turn right. At first traffic light, take a right on Westwood Blvd. Cypress Harbour is 1/2 mile on left. Traveling West on I-4: Take Exit 72 (528 East), to Exit #1 (Sea World). At traffic light go straight on Westwood Blvd. Cypress Harbour is approx. 1 1/2 mile on left.

Driving Directions: Follow the local roads towards Cádiz / Algeciras. Continue along the N340 toward Algeciras / Cádiz / Marbella for approximately 1km. Take the exit BenalmÃƒÂ¡dena / Algeciras. Continue along the A-7 for about 20km. Take the exit Fuengirola / Algeciras / Marbella A-7 (motorway) or continue towards Algeciras / Marbella AP-7 (toll road). In Marbella, the two roads reconnect to again form A-7. Continue along A-7 towards Algeciras / Cádiz. Take exit 181A, you will pass through two tunnels, continue for approximately 3km. Take the exit for Cancelada/Cambio de Sentido. Take the traffic circle or roundabout 3/4 way around, cross the bridge to the next traffic circle or round about towards Marbella / Malaga. Join the A-7 in the opposite direction, continue 2km, take the first exit after the Senator Banus Spa Hotel, El Presidente Km 168. See a purple Marriott Sign. Travel Time: 1 hour
GPS coordinates: N (+) 36.46501, W (-) 5.01755
Tom Tom: N3628.038 W501.080

NOTE: For your convenience we recommend to take the Toll Road AP-7 towards
Marbella because the toll road will be faster.

The entrance to The Ritz-Carlton Club will be shortly after.*Remember to stay on the left!

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Driving Directions: After exiting the airport grounds continue until the traffic light and turn right. Follow the main road (route 30). On your way you will pass the Nisky Shopping Center on the right, next you will pass the Total Gas station on your left, following the Banco Popular on your left and the Texaco Gas station on your left. Keep following the waterfront and start moving into the right lane. Continue going on the main road, you will pass the Fire Station on your left. After the waterfront take a right at the next big 4-way intersection and follow the road along the Yacht Haven Grande Mall on your right. At the next light continue straight, you will pass Wendy's and then Havensight Mall/Cruise Ship Dock on your right side. Continue uphill until the 315-30 Junction. Cross over and continue straight ahead, Marriott's Frenchman's Cove will be½ mile on your right.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From the airport, turn left onto Kapule Highway (Hwy 51). At the end of Kapule Highway make a left turn onto Rice Street and continue about .5 miles. Make a left turn on to Ho'olaule'a Way at the entrance of the Kauai Marriott/Kauai Lagoons. Continue onward passing the Kauai Marriott, following the red signs that lead to Kalanipu'u. On the main drive you will cross two (2) bridges, after crossing the second bridge, make a left turn on to Holokawelu Way and continue until you reach the entrance of Marriott's Kauai Lagoons - Kalanipu'u. The registration office will be approximately 100 yards on your right.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From DCA: Follow the signs to Washington, D.C. (George Washington Parkway). Take the I-395/Route 1 north exit, which is the 14th Street Bridge. Merge to the far left lane and follow the signs for 14th Street. Follow 14th Street for approximately 10 blocks and make a left onto K Street. Merge into the right service lane on K Street. Make a right onto Connecticut Avenue. The hotel is on the right. From IAD: Follow the signs to Interstate 66 East to Washington, D.C. Follow I-66 to the Theodore Roosevelt Bridge (US Route 50). Take the E Street exit off the bridge. Turn left onto 17th Street which becomes Connecticut Avenue. The hotel is on the right side of Connecticut Avenue. From BWI: Head northeast on Elm Road toward Gov Harry R Hughes Drive. Continue onto I-195 W. Take exit 2B for MD-295 S/Baltimore/Washington Parkway toward Washington, D.C. Merge onto MD-295 S. Take the exit onto US 50 W toward Washington, D.C. Take the exit toward Ft. Lincoln Drive/South Dakota Avenue. Keep left at the fork and follow signs for South Dakota Avenue. Take a slight right onto South Dakota Ave NE and then a slight left to stay on South Dakota Ave NE. Turn right onto Vista Street NE. Take the first left onto Central Avenue NE. Turn left onto Rhode Island Avenue NE. Turn left onto 11th Street NW. Turn right onto K Street NW. Turn right onto Connecticut Avenue NW. The hotel is on the right.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Follow signs to Torremolinos/Cadiz (N340/A7/AP7). Proceed along the N340 towards Cadiz/Algeciras for about 1 km. Stay in right lane and follow the exit to Benalmadena/Algeciras (N340/A7/AP7). Proceed along the A7 for about 20 km. At this point the road splits into A7 and AP7 (toll road). Proceed on the A7 following the exit signs for Fuengirola/Algeciras/Marbella for about 15 km. Once you pass the Cabopino area the Resort is near. It is next to the Don Carlos Hotel high rise which will be on your left side. Take the Exit Elviria/Cambio de Sentido. Enter the next roundabout and go 3/4 round and cross the bridge crossing the highway. In the next roundabout, go 3/4 around and exit back onto the A7 (toward Malaga). Take the 1st exit on your right side after 400 meters. Proceed up the hill into the roundabout. Take the 2nd exit on your right side. The resort entrance is on the right. We suggest you do not to take the AP7 toll road. Travel time is about 40 minutes from the airport.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Departing southeast, follow Departing Flights sign, which becomes Terminals sign. Turn slight left onto Russell Rd. Turn left to take ramp to Swenson St/Tropicana Ave/Departing Flights. Merge onto Paradise Rd. Follow Paradise Rd onto Swenson St. Turn left onto Tropicana Ave and proceed west to Koval. Turn right onto Koval and continue north to Harmon Ave. Make a left on Harmon and go to the second light. Turn left onto the access road. Marriott's Grand Chateau is on the left hand side.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 15 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation: • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary valet parking
  • Vehicles over 6 feet 6 inches and or those with trailers are unable to park on property

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Turn left out of the airport onto Beach City Road. Follow to Hwy 278, William Hilton Parkway. Turn left on Hwy 278 and follow to King Neptune Drive. Turn right on King Neptune Drive and take your second left onto Shelter Cove Lane. The resort is 1/2 mile ahead on the left.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 14.00 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station—Greyhound 38.9 miles SW
  • Train Station—Savannah Amtrak 42.4 miles SW
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary on-site parking
  • Parking is not available for boats, RVs or trailers.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From RENO/TAHOE International Airport, take US 395 South towards Carson City/South Lake Tahoe for approx. 30.6 miles to US-50 to South Lake Tahoe for approx. 22.3 miles. Estimated time 1 hour 15 minutes.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Alternate Transportation: 898-2463
  • Estimated taxi fare: 180.00 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• On-site parking fee: $26 USD daily
  • Valet parking only. The resort does not offer self-parking or parking for recreational vehicles or trailers.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From Queen Beatrix Airport: Follow signs to Oranjestad/downtown. Continue on L.G. Smith Blvd, follow signs to hotel area/California Lighthouse. Continue on blvd. for approx. 3.5 miles. Ocean Club is on left.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 20.00 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station—Arubus 0.1 miles E
  • Car Rentals:
    • National Car Rental
    • Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary on-site parking
  • Accessible parking spaces available

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Exit airport to stoplight. Proceed straight on Ahukini Road. Turn left on Kuhio Hwy 56 at 2nd stoplight. Proceed on Kuhio Hwy 56 - merges into Kaumualii Hwy 50. Head West, follow signs to Poipu/Koloa. After 7 miles, turn left on Maluhia Rd Hwy 520 through the tunnel of trees. Once in Koloa Town, turn right on Koloa Rd. Turn left by Chevron Station on Poipu Rd. Continue on Poipu Rd for approx. 3 miles you will see resort entrance on right.
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • On-site parking fee: $15 USD daily

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From 93 North: Exit 23. Stay left after tunnel and follow signs to the Aquarium. At first traffic light turn left following signs for Aquarium. Take a right onto State Street. Hotel is 1st driveway on the left. From 93 South: Exit 24A (Government Street). Left at traffic light following signs for Aquarium. Right onto State Street. The hotel is the first driveway on the left.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Subway service, fee: 2.50 USD (one way)
  • Estimated taxi fare: 25 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station-North Station 1.1 miles N
  • Subway Station-Aquarium Stop on the Blue Line .1 mi
  • Train Station-North Station 1 miles N; South Station-1.3 miles S
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Valet parking, daily fee in USD: Custom House Owners 34.00 / Guests 42.00
  • Hourly fee in USD : 1 - 2 hours, Custom House Owners 15.00 / Guests 18.00
  • Hourly fee in USD : 2 - 4 hours, Custom House Owners 25.00 / Guests 31.00
  • Daily fee applies to Custom House Owners / Guests staying 4+ hours

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood International Airport: Take US 1 N, 1 mile to SE 17th St. Go east on 17th St. for approximately 2 miles, the road becomes Fort Lauderdale Beach Boulevard (formerly State Road A1A). Continue north on Fort Lauderdale Beach Boulevard approximately 1.5 miles. The resort is on the left behind BeachPlace Shopping Mall. Enter the parking garage from either Cortez Street or Fort Lauderdale Beach Boulevard northbound, take a ticket, and proceed to level P4 or P5. From Points North: Take I-95 South to Sunrise Boulevard Go east approximately 4.5 miles to Fort Lauderdale Beach Boulevard (formerly State Rd A1A). Go south on Fort Lauderdale Beach Boulevard for approximately 1 mile. The resort garage entrance is on left. Take a parking ticket and go to garage level P4 or P5 for the resort entrance.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Alternate Transportation: Airport Shuttle Van
  • Estimated taxi fare: 25 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station—Broward County Mass Transit Central Terminal 5 miles
  • Train Station—Tri-Rail/Amtrak 7 miles E
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • On-site parking, fee $14 USD daily

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: FROM HIGHWAY 278, proceed 6 ½ miles to the Sea Pines traffic circle, move to the left lane and take the 3rd right (Pope Avenue). FROM POPE AVENUE, continue 1 mile to the 2nd traffic Light and turn right onto Cordillo Parkway. Continue 1½ miles to the end of Cordillo Parkway and turn right. Proceed to the Sea Pines back gate and pay $5 USD fee. The resort is 1 mile ahead on the left.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Alternate Transportation : Lowcountry Adventure Tours
  • Estimated taxi fare: 14.00 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Train Station—Amtrak 51.3 miles E
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary on-site
  • One 1 parking spot per unit guaranteed, secondary cars may be directed to offsite parking.
  • RV’s, trailers, motorcycles, commercial/company vehicles are not allowed in Sea Pines Plantation.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Take I-70 West toward Vail/Grand Junction. Follow I-70 for 112 miles and take the Vail exit #176. Stay left in the roundabout and go back under I-70. At the second roundabout, turn right onto South Frontage Road. Follow South Frontage Road about 1 mile, then turn left onto West Lionshead Circle. The Ritz-Carlton Club®, Vail, will be on your right at 728 West Lionshead Circle.
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Complimentary transportation¹
  • Shuttle from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. during winter months
  • Transportation available to Vail Village upon request
  • Additional fees may apply for certain services and amenities.
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary parking
  • Heated, underground parking garage

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: From Interstate I-95:Take Exit #79 PGA Boulevard East. Follow PGA Boulevard for approx. 2.5 miles. As you cross the intersection of US Highway One (U.S. 1) onto 'Riviera Beach PGA Boulevard becomes A1A South. Follow A1A south for approx. 5-6 miles. You will see Marriott's Oceana Palms on your left.
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Train Station—West Palm Beach 10 miles SW
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • Complimentary on-site parking

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Take H1 Freeway West, toward Waianae. Proceed 18 miles, exit right at Ko Olina. After passing the guard stand, drive 1 mile to Waipahe Place. Turn right at the Lagoon 4 sign. Marriott's Ko Olina Beach Club is on your right.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Alternate Transportation: SpeediShuttle, reservation required
  • Estimated taxi fare: 90.00 USD (one way)
  • Onsite Enterprise Rent-A-Car desk For additional transportation please contact concierge services at 808-679-4728
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • On-site Parking: Please click here to view parking rate information.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Follow the signs to Playa De Palma / Santanyi / Llucmajor and take exit #20 at the sign Son Antem. At the round about take the 2nd exit to the right and follow this small lane for about 1 km, parallel to the hwy. At the large“Marriott" sign turn right until you come through the security gate of the resort and continue following the signs to the hotel where the reception is located.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo:
• Alternate Transportation: Palma de Mallorca-Train Station
  • Estimated taxi fare: 25 EUR (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary on-site parking
Other Transportation
  • Car Rentals (on-site): Sixt

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: East on HWY 4026. North on HWY 402. At kilometer marker 38 turn left.
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Local taxi service from airport to hotel is THB 600/way or estimated 15 USD.
  • Limousine service to and from airport THB 1500 or 45 USD per car per way, 3 people maximum.
  • Van service THB 1500 or 45 USD per van per way, 7 people maximum. Advance reservations through hotel required.
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary on-site parking
  • Complimentary valet parking

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Turn left out of the airport onto Beach City Road. Follow to Hwy 278, William Hilton Parkway. Turn left on Hwy 278 and follow to King Neptune Drive. Turn right on King Neptune Drive and take your second left onto Shelter Cove Lane. The resort is 1/2 mile ahead on the left.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 14 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station—Greyhound 38.9 miles SW
  • Train Station—Savannah Amtrak 42.4 miles SW
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• Complimentary on-site parking
  • Parking is not available for boats, RVs or trailers.

MVWCTransportInfo.drivingDirection: Exit airport, turn left on El Cielo. Go to Ramon Road, turn left. Go on Ramon 6 miles to I-10 East. Continue on I-10 E, take first exit, Monterey Ave. Turn right on Monterey Ave., Marriott's Shadow Ridge is on left.
MVWCTransportInfo.transportHelpInfo: • Estimated taxi fare: 30.00 USD (one way)
MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation:
• Bus Station:Sunline Transit Agency (3.5 mi NW)
  • Car Rentals (nearby): Hertz
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo: • Complimentary on-site parking

MVWCTransportInfo.otherTransportation: This resort does not provide shuttle service.
MVWCTransportInfo.parkingInfo:
• On-site parking with fee
  • Valet parking with fee
  • Off-site parking with fee
• Complimentary on-site parking

VilaDetails.detail:
• 1-Bedroom, 2-Bath Villa
  • 1-Bedroom, 3-Bath Bi-Level Loft
  • 2-Bedroom, 3-Bath Bi-Level Loft

1-Bedroom, 2-Bath Villa

  • Approximately 805 sq. ft.
  • King bed and sofa bed in the master bedroom
  • Sofa bed in the living room
  • Shower and Shower/Tub combination
  • Table with seating for 6
  • Wood burning fireplace (complimentary wood provided in the villa)
  • Balcony

1-Bedroom, 3-Bath Bi-Level Loft

  • Approximately 1130 sq. ft.
  • King bed and sofa bed in the master bedroom
  • King bed in the loft with bathroom (accessible by narrow spiral staircase)
  • Sofa bed in the living room
  • Shower/Tub combination in the master and loft
  • Shower in third bathroom
  • Vaulted ceilings
  • Table with seating for 8
  • Wood burning fireplace (complimentary wood provided in the villa)
  • Balcony

2-Bedroom, 3-Bath Bi-Level Loft

  • Approximately 1305 sq. ft.
  • King bed and sofa bed in the master bedroom
  • King bed in the loft with bathroom (accessible by narrow spiral staircase)
  • King bed in separate bedroom in the loft (accessible by narrow spiral staircase)
  • Sofa bed in the living room
  • Shower/Tub combination in the master bedroom and loft
  • Shower in third bathroom
  • Vaulted ceilings
  • Table with seating for 8
  • Wood burning fireplace (complimentary wood provided in the villa)
  • Balcony
